H0.text: what color is the cue ball in pool. Yellow

H1.text: what color is the cue ball in pool. Red

H2.text: what color is the cue ball in pool. Blue

H3.text: what color is the cue ball in pool. white

A4.text: In British-style eight-ball pool and its blackball variant, fifteen object balls are used, but fall into two unnumbered groups, the reds (or less commonly blues) and yellows, with a white cue ball, and black 8 ball.
